t.t-value: non_biochemistry.filtered(lambda clg:clg.is_normal_range_2 and not clg.is_UOM and not clg.is_min_sec and not clg.is_brucella and not clg.is_brucella_rose and not clg.is_polar and not clg.is_widal and not clg.is_rpr)

t.span: *Note: For borderline positive results, it is recommended repeating the test within 4 - 6 weeks for confirming the result.

t.strong: *Kindly repeat the test after 5 days or do BHCG Quantitative for confirmation.

t.t-value: non_biochemistry.filtered(lambda clg:clg.is_inr and clg.has_two_result and clg.is_patient_and_control_2 and clg.has_three_result and clg.is_min_sec_3)
non_biochemistry.filtered(lambda clg:clg.is_inr or clg.has_two_result and clg.is_patient_and_control_2 and not clg.has_three_result and not clg.is_min_sec_3)

tr.th: Remarks: According to CLSI Guideline M43-A (2011), organisms susceptible to Tetracycline will also be susceptible to Doxycycline. Organisms susceptible to Erythromycin will also be susceptible to Azithromycin.

tr.t-if: o.semen_head_defects or o.semen_head_defects_2 or o.semen_head_defects_3 or o.semen_head_defects_4
o.semen_neck_midpiece_defects or o.semen_neck_midpiece_defects_2 or o.semen_neck_midpiece_defects_3 or o.semen_neck_midpiece_defects_4
o.semen_tail_defects or o.semen_tail_defects_2 or o.semen_tail_defects_3 or o.semen_tail_defects_4

t.t-value: non_biochemistry.filtered(lambda clg:clg.is_blood_group and clg.has_two_result and clg.is_polar_2)

t.t-if: app.name and app.result and app.lab_uom_id or app.normal_range
app.name and app.rs2_result and app.rs2_lab_uom_id or app.rs2_normal_range
app.name and app.result and app.lab_uom_id or app.normal_range
app.name and app.rs2_result and app.rs2_lab_uom_id or app.rs2_normal_range
app.name and app.brucella_result or app.lab_uom_id_2 or app.normal_range_2
app.name and app.brucella_rose_result or app.lab_uom_id_2 or app.normal_range_2
app.name and app.normal_range_2 or app.result or app.alcohol_result or app.drugs_result or app.gonorrhea_result or app.celiac_result

t.t-else: app.drugs_result == False and app.alcohol_result==False and and app.gonorrhea_result==False and and app.celiac_result==False

t.t-if: app.name or app.result or app.lab_uom_id_2 or app.normal_range_2
